scripts.start: cross-env REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common REQUEST_LOG_FILE=debug.log DEBUG=notes:* nodemon app.mjs
scripts.fs-start: cross-env REQUEST_LOG_FORMAT=common REQUEST_LOG_FILE=debug.log NOTES_MODEL=fs DEBUG=notes:* nodemon app.mjs
scripts.fs-server1: cross-env NOTES_MODEL=fs DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3001 node app.mjs
scripts.fs-server2: cross-env NOTES_MODEL=fs NOTES_FS_DIR=notes DEBUG=notes:* PORT=3002 node app.mjs
